title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Book with points at these 10 wellness-centric hotels for an active start to 2026
items.description: From Bali and Rome to Costa Rica and Colorado, these properties have a lot to offer those in search of a movement-focused vacation.

items.title: The best time to book flights for the cheapest airfare for spring break and the rest of 2026

items.title: How to plan your 2026 travels around public holidays to maximize your vacation time
